text: Holmi or Holmoi (), or Holmia, also possibly called Hermia, was a GreekPseudo Scylax, Periplous, §102 town of Cilicia Tracheia with a harbor, a little to the south-west of Seleucia ad Calycadnum. When Seleucia ad Calycadnum was founded, the inhabitants of Holmi migrated there.Strabo, Geography, §14.5.4Stephanus of Byzantium, Ethnica, §O490.5 Its site is located near Taşucu in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:History of Mersin Province Category:Greek colonies in Anatolia
title: Holmi
